title: Calluna Sans regular, can be used on commercial themeforest themes?
content:
Hi,

just wondering if this is possible?  
I find out that the regular font was free. So I tought maybe I could use it on a wordpress theme I am designing. I will sell it on themeforest.

Best,  
Sindre
author: sinols

comments.content:
In general: no. Think of it as a standard commercial font which just happens to have a price of $0,00.  
It has a typical license agreement (EULA) of a commercial font, which would not allow distribution/resale.

But you can simply ask the designer if he is willing to allow the use you are interested in.
